name: OracleX
description: Oracle X (OEX) is a next-generation decentralized prediction market ecosystem built on the Binance Smart Chain, designed to harness Swarm Intelligence through advanced AI integration. Unlike traditional platforms, Oracle X utilizes a proprietary "Dual-Coin Drive" (OEX/USDX) to separate ecosystem governance from market volatility, ensuring robust stability for settlement. The protocol features Proof of Contribution (POC) mining, a mechanism that rewards users for generating valuable prediction data. By bridging real-world events with Web3 financial derivatives, Oracle X functions as a critical data protocol layer, offering scalable, risk-managed prediction markets for finance, sports, and governance.
